A great deal of you probably remembers this series aired at the end of 20th century.

[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0283775/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0283775/)

![the_planets_front.jpg](http://www.webmallindia.com/img/film_additional_images/the_planets_front.jpg)

I just wanted to introduce it to younger viewers and those who missed it because it was made right before the boom of extrasolar planets and Kuiper belt objects. It's not obsolete, but it offers a nice historical insight. It's also very informative. A book was published following the mini series. It was pretty huge with nice color images.

I can only recommend it for everyone into planetary geology and Solar system exploration.
